snippet.title: Sketchy's Contract EA Trailer 2
snippet.description:
As a solo dev I am extremely proud to release Sketchy's Contract as it has been a tough journey to get here!

Play alone or with up to 7 of your friends and see how high you can climb the ranks. You'll be able to kill creatures and loot their bodies for qutoa, use farming weapons like pickaxes and shovels to harvest planetary minerals, and search for scrap in sketchy loot chests. 

Of course, everyone should be rewarded for succeeding, so Sketchy provides you with a happy meal containing credits, claw machine coins, and gotcha coins to go have fun at the arcade and win yourself some cosmetics!

Sketchy's Contract is now available on Steam for $8.99 USD!
